mapper.select:
select l.leports_id, l.leports_title, l.leports_main_img, l.leports_loc, litem.leports_summary, litem.leports_price, l.review_cnt, l.review_star, to_char(l.leports_regidate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') leports_regidate from leports l join leports_item litem on l.leports_id = litem.leports_id
where leports_type = #{type} order by l.leports_id
where leports_loc not in('서울', '인천', '경기', '강원', '충청', '경상', '부산', '전라', '제주') order by leports_id
where leports_loc = #{loc} order by l.leports_id
order by l.leports_id, litem.leports_price

select l.leports_id, l.leports_title, l.leports_main_img, l.leports_sub_img1, l.leports_sub_img2, l.leports_sub_img3, l.leports_sub_img4, l.review_cnt, l.review_star, to_char(l.leports_regidate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') leports_regidate, litem.leports_item_id, litem.leports_item_title, litem.leports_summary, litem.leports_price, litem.leports_max_capacity, p.c_address, p.c_detail_address, p.c_phone, l.leports_content from partner p join leports l on l.partner_id = p.partner_id join leports_item litem on l.leports_id = litem.leports_id where l.leports_id = #{leports_id}

select r.review_id, r.leports_id, r.reservation_id, r.user_id, m.user_email, r.review_comments, to_char(r.review_regidate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') review_regidate from reservation_review r join member m on r.user_id = m.user_id where leports_id = #{leports_id}
mapper.update: update leports set reserve_cnt = reserve_cnt + 1 where leports_id = #{leports_id}
update leports set reserve_cnt = reserve_cnt - 1 where leports_id = #{leports_id}
mapper.select: select sum(rs_item_person) rs_item_person, leports_item_id from reservation_item where reservation_id in ( select reservation_id from reservation where leports_id = #{leports_id} and rs_date = to_date(#{rs_date}, 'yymmdd') ) group by leports_item_id

select l.leports_id, l.leports_title, l.leports_main_img, l.leports_loc, litem.leports_summary, litem.leports_price, l.review_cnt, l.review_star, l.reserve_cnt, to_char(l.leports_regidate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') leports_regidate from leports l join leports_item litem on l.leports_id = litem.leports_id order by l.review_star desc, litem.leports_price

select l.leports_id, l.leports_title, l.leports_main_img, l.leports_loc, litem.leports_summary, litem.leports_price, l.review_cnt, l.review_star, l.reserve_cnt, to_char(l.leports_regidate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') leports_regidate from leports l join leports_item litem on l.leports_id = litem.leports_id order by l.reserve_cnt desc, litem.leports_price
